title: riot pls, this is diamond elo and this shit happens
body:
hello riot can you please do something about these players, I'm already on 0 lp, i got the day off work so i wait till 9 am assuming kids will be at school( not remembering WA timezones n stuff) when i report players like this normally nothing ever happens so puting this on the forums hoping you will do something to ease my pain 

Which turned into TF afking lvl 1 and not playing and draven running down mid lane screaming TYLER1.... glad i woke up to have a game

replies.body:
It sux that you had to go through that.

Please make sure you report them in the end of game screen. I edited out the screenshot as boards is not the place to report other players. Can you send it through to player support?

But as if you're going to do anything about it right?
Because our games aren't televised because we weren't picked to play professionally? So who really cares if the player base complains, only the opinions of those players who the ENTIRE playerbase knows is taken into consideration. 
You guys really don't care about your players nearly as much as you imply you do.
Yes i will, thankyou for replying.

https://gyazo.com/b7a26391958d3f688eb56bb9cb13972e

This is the only game draven has done that. He probably didn't want to waste time with an afk TF and so fed mid to end the game before 20 (it was a 15m game thanks to him)

The TF only has that one leaver game in their last 20 matches

http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=hiimoutplayed

You probably just lucked out. We all get DC's from time to time - just report and don't bother posting on the forum.

Im unlucky enough to have to put up with that every single game in bronze .. was in gold last season now i have to try and carry 2 AFK and a troll every ranked game .. too heavy ;~; {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
